# samsungcloudplatformv2_vpc_publicips (Data Source)

list of publicip.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "samsungcloudplatformv2" {
}

data "samsungcloudplatformv2_vpc_publicips" "publicips" {
  limit = var.limit
}


output "publicips" {
  value = data.samsungcloudplatformv2_vpc_publicips.publicips
}


variable "limit" {
  type    = number
  default = 10
}
```
